module.name: ATutor MultiSite Manager
module.description: Intended for ATutor 2.2+. This module is used to create and manage ATutor subsites. A single ATutor codebase can be used to run any number of independent ATutor sites as fully independent domains. This module can only be installed on an ATutor main site of a multisite installation, not on subsites.

release.notes: Changes in this version are primarily the conversion from mysql to queryDB() database access, intended for use with ATutor 2.2+. Otherwise functionality is the same as that in the previous versions of this module. See the module's README file for full details on using this module.
